citations.narrative:
During the inspection it was found that two adult poodles were in a primary enclosure without water.
Not having access to water can cause dehydration and lead to significant health concerns.
Potable water must be continuously available to all the dogs.
Correction Date: October 17, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.10(a) 
   
Watering 
During the inspection it was found that two adult poodles were in a primary enclosure without water. 
Not having access to water can cause dehydration and lead to significant health concerns.  
Potable water must be continuously available to all the dogs. 
Correction Date: October 17, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
